department: Fisheries and Oceans Canada (Pêches et Océans Canada)
short_summary: REQUEST FOR PROPOSAL (RFQ) for Acquisition of EXX02 Sondes.
description: Fisheries and Oceans Canada has a requirement for the purchase, delivery to Burlington, Ontario by desired date of March 10, 2023.  The  \\  requirement is subject to various Canadian trade agreements. The bid solicitation is also open to suppliers who are not Supply Arrangement (SA) holders. In order for new suppliers to bid on this solicitation, the new supplier must first qualify for a SA. The process to qualify for a SA is detailed in RFSA \# E60PV-19EQUI and can be formatted on the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS - https:\/\/buyandsell.gc.ca\/procurement-data\/tenders).
